notes: Stronger version of the [[Deepling Spellsinger]]. Their wave is less sprite-saturated than the one shown while hovering the mouse pointer on the attack.
name: Deepling Master Librarian
behaviour: Same as a [[Deepling Spellsinger]]. It gains advantage in battle by weakening its opponent.
strategy: Kill it quickly before any other Deepling, just as you would for a [[Deepling Spellsinger]]. Its skill reduction will render you helpless and its mana drain will make you incapable of healing.
